BSInfo.jRoomDescPlayer:
This area was once of some importance, for its walls are plastered and painted, and evidence of carpeting can be seen in the corners, though such is now a ruin.

The floor is covered with litter, filth, bones, and possibly much more. The walls are dirty and stained, with great chunks of plaster pulled off and gouge marks everwhere else below ten foot height. The room stinks. An eight-footlong chain is bolted to the center of the floor.
BSInfo.jRoomDescDM:

The owlbear attacks fiercely, barring any passage through its chamber, until slain or forced back by its keeper. (This monster is not well-fed. )

Owlbear: AC 5, MV 12", HD 5 + 2, hp 38, #AT 3, D 1-6/1-6/2-12, SA "to hit" roll of 18 or more on claw attack means hug for additional 2-16 damage; XP 529

A thorough search of the mess produces 3- 30 each of gp, ep, sp, and cp.
